attributes.action: create a fair system of taxation by combining all taxes into one based on income only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
abolish stealth taxes ,vat,road fund,tax on savings and pensions,stamp duty,et al .introduce a flat one off fee depending on earnings only.the admin savings alone would be collossal.
i believe this government is avoiding biting the bullet on income tax . instead it looks to create new evermore insidious taxation creating its own masses of red tape and public service jobs paid for by? thats right us.
